headline: Piper Sandler Raises PT on Fortinet (FTNT) Stock
summary: Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) is one of the Oversold Fundamentally Strong Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 5, Piper Sandler analyst Rob Owens lifted the price target on the company’s stock to $90 from $85 while keeping a “Neutral” rating, as reported by The Fly. As per the firm, 2025 was a difficult year for its Security & […]
